Author: shak3nbak3#2279
Content: KMD noob question: in order to receive monthly rewards do I have to sign in to the wallet once a month, or have a transaction of 10+KMD per month?

Author: CHMEX#0686
Content:
You have to send the complete balance to your self.
Once you login to agama there is a claim button which will do exactly that

Author: shak3nbak3#2279
Content: Thanks, but I've already been able to claim twice, but I thought I read somewhere that in order to keep receiving rewards that you have to have at least one transaction per month

Author: siu - Chainmakers#3920
Content: At least one per year

Author: CHMEX#0686
Content: Yes that is correct in about 41 days you will have to claim it once a month. This change is activated with block 1m

Author: CHMEX#0686
Content: https://docs.komodoplatform.com/komodo/block-1M-changes.html

Author: CHMEX#0686
Content:
Rewards

Currently, the rewards mechanism will cap the amount of accrued rewards after 1 year. For example, if the coins sit in the same address for more than a full year, the amount of rewards will stop accruing at 5% total. This mechasism is being changed to cap the amount of accrued rewards after 1 month. This means in order to receive the maximum amount of rewards, a user must claim them at least once per month. This in turn, changes the amount of rewards to 5.1% per year.
This change is being made to encourage users to be active and use KMD more often.

Content: Thanks for the explanation!
